original: ye hi jinā viditānutpādatve'pi vyavahāramukhapūrṇakaruṇayā saṃsṛtisahasre sukhena lokarakṣaṇāyeha pratipannā api nirmalamatayastānahaṃ sadā  #

original: paramārtho niṣprapañcaḥ kartavyo dvividhaḥ sa ca || 2 ||

original: etādṛk paramārtho hi yathābhāse tu saṃvṛtiḥ || 6 ||
